summary: This mods adds the melee-weapon of the Diamond Sword-Tribe from the game Tribes:Ascend to the game. The weapon has a own recipe and is smithable.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8273]Also available at the Steam Workshop![/url]

[u]Update 1 (11.02.2012):[/u]
[list][*]The sword ist upgradeable now at a sharpening wheel (requires the Dwarven Smithing perk)
[*]Balancing[/list]

[u]First of all:[/u]

I know that a Sci-Fi-Weapon may doesn\'t fit into a Fantasy-game. But I don\'t care.
Please don\'t post comments about that. Download it or not. Nobody forces you to use the mod.
Also this is a beta, I will improve the mod after the CK is released.

I love the game, it\'s the most fun I had online for years. Here\'s my contribution.
The model is made from the scratch as well as the textures, the only reference where the screenshots I made.

[b]The ingame description and the name are pure satire. Usually I play as Blood Eagle.[/b]

This mod adds the melee-weapon of the tribe \"Diamond Sword\" from the game Tribes:Ascend to Skyrim. The weapon is smithable but needs the following things:
[list]
[*]5 Leather Strips
[*]6 Dwarven metal Ingots
[*]6 Corundum Ingots
[*]3 Quicksilver Ingots
[/list]
[u]Stats:[/u]
[list]
[*]Damage: 18
[*]Weight: 12
[*]Value: 1000 Gold
[/list]
If you think it\'s unbalanced leave a comment with suggestions for better balance. I tried to make it a pretty strong weapon.

Gonna make the heavy-armors sword too.

[u]Update Version 1.0:[/u]

The Sword has now a fully functional Collision Model and shows blood on the edge!

[u]Credits:[/u]
[list][*]cR45h - Texture, normal map and reflection map
[*]Syncing - Model, UV, Bake, model compile, esp[/list]
